accroche: Engineer full-stack programmer, and more recently Product Owner, I'm always looking to be more relevant on the work I do, and improve my knowledge to be able to teach them.

experiences.description: As a consultant for SOLUTEC, I'm in charge of a 4 dvelopers team. I have the roles of Product Owner, Scrum Master, QA Test writer and production analyst. As a PO and QA Tester, I must analyse the functionnal needs and transcript it into User Stories, follow their developments, prepare the main test scenarios, and validate their proper behavior. For analysing the production environment, main key users report anomalies. I then search for their causes and even prepare a bug fix or operate a correction of the datas. I also participate in the Agile comunity, where we exchange around the retrospectives we animate in our respective teams.

As a consultant for SOLUTEC, I've participated in the creation and the full-stack development of intern managing tools for the company, in order to redesign completely the Information system.
Mostly working in the front-end team, I've been joining the back-end team for a year during this mission.
I'm also the Scrum Master of several teams of five people each.

Front-End programmer in a ten people team working on different technical parts of the project.
I worked on the creation of the new Engie customer Area for the professionnals. Front-end programming of different pages and modules of the website.

experiences.role: Full Stack programmer using Symfony 2 and AngularJs
experiences.description:
During those three months I worked on finishing my internship project. The main goal was to put the first module of the website in production, and progress on the e-learning module development.
(See next experience for more information on the project)

experiences.role: Full Stack programmer using Symfony 2 and AngularJs
experiences.description:
The goal of this internship project was to create a web portal, comprised of a monitoring tool and an e-learning tool.
The monitoring tool transforms configuration files into tables gathering multiples graphs in order to show activity reports on the work in progress in the company.
The E-Learning Module allows the user to follow lessons or tutorials and answer some tests to verify and confirm his knowledge required to work well.
Working within the IT Service of Amaris, in Vienna, I helped to implement new features on the ERP of the company (made from scratch with .NET framework and jQuery).

projects.role: Creation of an escape room game in a CAVE environment
projects.description: In a binomial group, we made an Escape Room game in an immersive environment  CAVE (Cave Automatic Virtual Environment) in the purpose of the Augmented Reality class I followed in Polytechnique Montreal.

projects.role: Creation of a prototype of a treadmill linked to an Oculus Rift
projects.description:
In charge of a five persons group, we created a virtual reality system made of a treadmill and an Oculus Rift. The user/player put the headset on and evolve by running on the treadmill in a virtual environment. The runner's speed is replicated in the game, and the slopes angles influence automatically the tilt of the readmill.
The project was presented at the Laval Virtual show which occured on April 2015.

formations.description: First exchange semester at the Concordia University of Montreal
Student in this Engineering School. Embedded Systems Major

hobbiesList.title: Treasurer of Game Dev Party association
hobbiesList.description: Association of video game makers. We organize several game jams and meetups annually. We're also recording a podcast about the association and game design.

hobbiesList.title: Blog
hobbiesList.description: Maintaining a blog and writing articles on Video Games and its industry.
